normalized_lines: In a medium-sized bowl, mix the flour, sugar, and hot chocolate mix together with a whisk and make a well in the center
Add the oil, eggs, and cream to the well and whisk though roughly until the whole mixture is homogenous
Pour the batter into an oiled baking pan and sprinkle the chocolate chips on top
Bake for about 20 minutes or until a toothpick comes out dry

target_recipe.title: Cake
steps: In a medium-sized bowl, mix the flour, sugar, and hot chocolate mix together with a whisk and make a well in the center
Add the oil, eggs, and cream to the well and whisk though roughly until the whole mixture is homogenous
Pour the batter into an oiled baking pan and sprinkle the chocolate chips on top
Bake for about 20 minutes or until a toothpick comes out dry
